item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, November 19, 2024 at 1:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Launch HN: Regatta Storage (YC F24) – Turn S3 into a local-like, POSIX cloud FS (321 points | 199 comments)
2. Show HN: FastGraphRAG – Better RAG using good old PageRank (205 points | 61 comments)
3. 20 years of Google Scholar (166 points | 92 comments)
4. MailCatcher runs a super simple SMTP server (140 points | 55 comments)
5. A BBC navigation bar component broke depending on the external monitor (207 points | 76 comments)
6. Don't sit on the toilet for more than 10 minutes, doctors warn (31 points | 10 comments)
7. Air traffic failure caused by two locations 3600nm apart sharing 3-letter code (149 points | 162 comments)
8. Show HN: Venmo Unofficial API (19 points | 5 comments)
9. The Skyline algorithm for packing 2D rectangles (122 points | 35 comments)
10. Show HN: Tips.io – A Tailwind playground with AI, page management, and theming (177 points | 44 comments)
11. Bird brain from the age of dinosaurs reveals roots of avian intelligence (85 points | 5 comments)
12. Waiting for many things at once with io_uring (65 points | 16 comments)
13. Two undersea cables in Baltic Sea disrupted (112 points | 312 comments)
14. Trieve (YC W24) Is Hiring a software engineer to build OpenAPI tooling ( | hide)
15. Reactive HTML Notebooks (293 points | 47 comments)
16. Towards Nyquist Learners (46 points | 24 comments)
17. Is Chrome the New IE? (2023) (185 points | 202 comments)
18. Histogramming Bytes with Positional Popcount (5 points | discuss)
19. LLaVA-O1: Let Vision Language Models Reason Step-by-Step (139 points | 26 comments)
20. AMD now has more compute on the top 500 than Nvidia (122 points | 76 comments)
21. DNA testing company vanishes along with its customers' genetic data (63 points | 16 comments)
22. JGS ASCII ART gallery (2001) (10 points | 2 comments)
23. End-to-End Tour of Text Layout/Rendering (2015) (19 points | 4 comments)
24. A programmable FPGA SoM in the tiny microSD form factor (67 points | 18 comments)
25. Against Best Practices (203 points | 164 comments)
26. Show HN: Nova JavaScript Engine (228 points | 94 comments)
27. An Uncanny Moat (12 points | 12 comments)
28. Libobscura (76 points | 5 comments)
29. Extending the context length to 1M tokens (82 points | 94 comments)
30. Illegally logged wood from Cambodia likely ending up in U.S. homes (111 points | 67 comments)
